definitions.definition: happening or existing as part of nature and not made or done by people:
examples: A healthy body will be able to fight off the illness naturally without the use of medicine.

definitions.definition: having an ability or characteristic from birth:
examples: He's naturally funny - he doesn't even have to try.

definitions.definition: If a particular skill comes naturally (to you), you are able to do it easily, with little effort or learning:
examples: Dancing seemed to come naturally to her.
